Introduzca la función fx1: sqrt((x2^2)/5)
Introduzca la función fx2: (1/4)*(sin(x1)+cos(x2))
Introduzca la función fx3: 0
Introduzca el valor de x1: 0.121
Introduzca el valor de x2: 0.271
Introduzca el valor de x3: 0
Valor de k= 0
Introduzca el valor de precisión: 1e-8

K  x1(k)              x2(k)              x3(k)              error
1  0.121194884380489  0.271052159747864  0.000000000000000  1.948844e-004
2  0.121218210928871  0.271097032987245  0.000000000000000  4.487324e-005
3  0.121238278851597  0.271099817947808  0.000000000000000  2.006792e-005
4  0.121239524323823  0.271104611662039  0.000000000000000  4.793714e-006
5  0.121241668138000  0.271104599813072  0.000000000000000  2.143814e-006
6  0.121241662838981  0.271105132625649  0.000000000000000  5.328126e-007
7  0.121241901120009  0.271105095639335  0.000000000000000  2.382810e-007
8  0.121241884579227  0.271105157248499  0.000000000000000  6.160916e-008
9  0.121241912131683  0.271105149018982  0.000000000000000  2.755246e-008
10  0.121241908451331  0.271105156407490  0.000000000000000  7.388509e-009
>>  


x1=subs(G{x1,x2},{x0(1),x0(2)})
x1=G(0.121, 0.271) =  [0.121194884380489  0.271052159747864]
error= 
x1(1) - x0(1) = para x
x1(2) - x0(2) = para y
error=1.948844e-004

x2=G(0.121194884380489,0.271052159747864) = [0.121218210928871  0.271097032987245]
error= 
x2(1) - x1(1) = para x
x2(2) - x1(2) = para y 
error=4.487324e-005
